name: DefinitlyNotTowerfall
description:
You're here out of curiosity aren't you? (╭ರᴥ•́)

It's a natural thing, really. Even more in front of what is gonna make you rethink your whole definition of what a video game is. An ocean of novelty, to say so. I introduce you

┐(・。・┐) ♪ NotTowerfall  ♪ (/・     。・)/

The fact that the game has no menu nor end was clearly an artistic choice if you wonder.

All map tiles came from Unity store thanks to Fully{Beta} for those awesome free assets!

Team members :

Nathan Mugnier - developper, sound designer and level design assistant

Aurélien Plantard - developper and UI artist

Adrien Fallot - developper, character artist and animator 

Léo Piérot - developper and fx artist

Computer Sama - Level design

(Forgive me guys, I couldn't resist,. Putting just developper in front of every name was too damn boring to read :v)
